related_questions.question: Pilihan alat transportasi saat ini sangat banyak. Alat transportasi yang paling tepat    dipilih ketika bepergian jauh lintas pulau adalah .... dibantu ya kak​

Tuliskan manfaat air yang ditemukan ditempat tempat berikut!    A. Tanah
B. Sumur
C. Laut 
D. Sungai​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Air Tanah berfungsi Memenuhi berbagai keperluan rumah tangga, seperti mandi, memasak, minum, dan mencuci. Irigasi pertanian, pada sawah petani yang letaknya jauh dari sumber air seperti pada sungai umumnya kemudian akan membuat sumur bor untuk mencukupi berbagai kebutuhan air tanaman pertanian.

B. fungsi air sumur

1. Meminimalisir Genangan Air Hujan

2. mengurangi risiko banjir

3. menambah cadangan air tanah

Penjelasan:

maaf cuma segini, selebihnya cari di google ya kak

related_questions.question:
Read the paragraph below.    Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep
b. it's too painful for him too 
sleep
c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep
d. the paint is painful too to sleep
e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Read the paragraph below.

Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep

b. it's too painful for him too

sleep

c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep

d. the paint is painful too to sleep

e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep

Penjelasan:

di atas jawapin ya

Rudi dan teman-teman sekelasnya bermain basket pagi-pagi sekali di sekolah. Banyak siswa yang memperhatikan mereka. Pertandingan berlangsung seru sebelum kecelakaan terjadi. Sayangnya, Rudi
